attributes.action: Support The U.K. PM on asking Her Majesty the Queen to prorogue Parliament.
attributes.additional_details: Even if this was over Brexit. Enough is Enough. End three years of hell for what was democratically voted for. Allow people to get on with their lives, allow businesses to stop holding their breathes. Immigration start being regulated. Talk this country up, not down. Show support. Sign this petition.
attributes.background: We support the PM in requesting Her Majesty the Queen to Prorogued Parliament for several days until 14th October. We have had a disastrous year with out U.K. government. It’s time start a fresh. Those arguing against have absolutely no plan for anything other then to prolong the voters agony.
